p: According to the World Oral Health report, despite great advances in dental health, the dental health problems still remain and are predominantly observed among underprivileged groups in both developing and developed countries [ 8]. In this context, many traditionally used medicines for treating infections have been considered again, due to the emerging problems related to overuse of antibiotics. Clinical trials are being performed to establish their efficacy and possible side effects. One of these categories of natural medicines is essential oils (EOs). In the current years, there has been an amplified attention towards EOs [ 9].
